translations.item: 添加一个退货管理系统
Mostrar tiempo de devolución del producto
Afișează perioada de returnare a produsului

item.name: Do not take weekends into account when calculating product return period

translations.item: No tener en cuenta los fines de semana para calcular el tiempo de devolución del producto
Μην πάρετε τα Σαββατοκύριακα υπόψη κατά τον υπολογισμό της περιόδου επιστροφής των προϊόντων
Nu lua în considerare când se va calcula perioada de returnare a produsului
Не учитывать выходные при подсчете периода возврата товара
NE upoštevaj konec tedna pri izračunu dobe vračanja izdelka
当计算产品退货期时不考虑周末

queries.item: database/demo.sql
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_property_descriptions;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_properties;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_return_products;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_returns;

CREATE TABLE `?:rma_properties` ( `property_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `position` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default '', `type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'R', `update_totals_and_inventory` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', PRIMARY KEY (`property_id`), KEY `c_status` (`property_id`,`status`), KEY `status` (`status`,`type`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:rma_return_products` ( `return_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `item_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `product_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `reason` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `amount` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `price` decimal(12,2) NOT NULL default '0.00', `product_options` text, `product` VARCHAR( 255 ) NOT NULL default '', PRIMARY KEY (`return_id`,`item_id`,`type`), KEY `reason` (`reason`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

CREATE TABLE `?:rma_returns` ( `return_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `order_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `user_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `timestamp` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `action` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'O', `total_amount` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `comment` text, `extra` text, PRIMARY KEY (`return_id`), KEY `order_id` (`order_id`), KEY `timestamp` (`timestamp`), KEY `user_id` (`user_id`), KEY `status` (`status`) ) Engine=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET UTF8;

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (status, type, description, email_subj, email_header, lang_code) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Requested', 'has been requested successfully.', 'Your return has been requested successfully.', 'en');
REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (status, type, description, email_subj, email_header, lang_code) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Approved', 'has been approved.', 'Your return has been approved.', 'en');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (status, type, description, email_subj, email_header, lang_code) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Declined', 'has been declined.', 'Your return has been declined. Please contact shop administration.', 'en');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (status, type, description, email_subj, email_header, lang_code) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Completed', 'has been completed.', 'Your return has been completed. Thank you for choosing us.', 'en');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Выполнен', 'был выполнен', 'Ваш запрос на возврат был выполнен. Спасибо, что выбрали нас.', 'ru');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Рассматриваемый', 'был создан успешно.', 'Ваш запрос на возврат был создан успешно.', 'ru');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Подтвежден', 'был подтвержден', 'Ваш запрос на возврат был подтвержден', 'ru');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Отклонен', 'был отклонен', 'Ваш запрос на возврат был отклонен. Пожалуйста, свяжитесь с администрацией магазина.', 'ru');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Anmodning', 'Din anmoding er blevet godkendt', 'Din anmodning er blevet godkendt', 'da');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Godkendt', 'Er blevet godkendt', 'Din RMA er blevet godkendt', 'da');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Afvist', 'Er blevet afvist', 'Din RMA er blevet afvist. Kontakt venligst butikkens administration', 'da');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Færdig behandlet', 'Er færdig behandlet', 'Din RMA er afsluttet. Tak fordi du valgte os', 'da');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Ζήτηση', 'ζητήθηκε επιτυχώς.', 'Η αλλαγή σας ζητήθηκε επιτυχώς.', 'el');
REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Εγκριση', 'εγκρίθηκε.', 'Η αλλαγή σας εγκρίθηκε.', 'el');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Απόρριψη', 'απορρίφτηκε.', 'Η αλλαγή σας απορίφθηκε. Παρακαλούμε επικοινωνήστε με τον διαχειριστή του καταστήματος..', 'el');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Ολοκλήρωση', 'ολοκληρώθηκε.', 'Η αλλαγή σας ολοκληρώθηκε. Ευχαριστούμε που μας επιλέξατε.', 'el');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Solicitada', 'ha sido solicitada con éxito.', 'Su petición de devolución ha sido solicitada con éxito.', 'es');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Aceptada', 'ha sido aceptada.', 'Su petición de devolución ha sido aprobada.', 'es');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Rechazada', 'ha sido rechazada.', 'Su petición de devolución ha sido rechazada. Por favor contacta con la administración de la tienda.', 'es');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Completada', 'ha sido completada.', 'Su petición de devolución ha sido completada. Gracias por elegirnos.', 'es');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Solicitat', 'a fost solicitat cu success.', 'Cererea dvs. de returnare a fost depusă cu succes.', 'ro');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Aprobat', 'a fost aprobat.', 'Solicitarea dvs. de returnare a fost aprobată.', 'ro');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Respins', 'a fost respins.', 'Solicitarea dvs. de returnare a fost respinsă. Vă rugăm contactați administrația magazinului.', 'ro');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Completă', 'a fost finalizat.', 'Solicitarea dvs. de returnare a fost finalizată. Vă mulțumim că ne-ați ales.', 'ro');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Zahteva', 'zahteva je bila uspešna', 'Vaša vrnitev je bila zahtevana uspešno.', 'sl');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Odobreno', 'je bilo odobreno.', 'Vaša vrnitev je bila odobrena.', 'sl');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Zavrnjeno', 'je bilo zavrnjeno', 'Vaša vrnitev je bila zavrnjena. Prosimo, kontaktirajte administratorja.', 'sl');

REPLACE INTO ?:status_descriptions (`status`, `type`, `description`, `email_subj`, `email_header`, `lang_code`) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Končano', 'je bilo končano.', 'Vaše vračilo je bilo končano. Hvala, ker ste nas izbrali.', 'sl');
REPLACE INTO ?:statuses (status, type, is_default) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'Y');
REPLACE INTO ?:statuses (status, type, is_default) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'Y');
REPLACE INTO ?:statuses (status, type, is_default) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'Y');
REPLACE INTO ?:statuses (status, type, is_default) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'Y');
REPLACE INTO ?:status_data (status, type, param, value) VALUES ('A', 'R', 'inventory', 'I');
REPLACE INTO ?:status_data (status, type, param, value) VALUES ('C', 'R', 'inventory', 'I');
REPLACE INTO ?:status_data (status, type, param, value) VALUES ('D', 'R', 'inventory', 'D');
REPLACE INTO ?:status_data (status, type, param, value) VALUES ('R', 'R', 'inventory', 'I');
DELETE FROM ?:status_descriptions WHERE type = 'R'
DELETE FROM ?:status_data WHERE type = 'R'
DELETE FROM ?:statuses WHERE type = 'R'

REPLACE INTO ?:privileges (privilege, is_default, section_id) VALUES ('manage_rma', 'Y', 'addons');
DELETE FROM ?:privileges WHERE privilege LIKE 'manage_rma'
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_property_descriptions;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_properties;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_return_products;
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS ?:rma_returns;

language_variables.item: Nu a fost găsită nici o cerere
Pas de demandes de retour trouvée
Request a replacement or a refund
Richiedi una sostituzione o un rimborso
View and process return requests from orders placed on your web site.
Просмотр и обработка запросов на возврат по заказам, сделанным в вашем магазине.
查看和处理从您的网站上下单的退货要求.
Mostra e processa le richieste di ritorno dagli ordini immessi sul tuo sito web.
Εμφάνιση και πρόοδος των αιτήσεων που επιστράφηκαν από παραγγελίες που έλαβαν χώρα στην ιστοσελίδα σας.
Преглед и обработка на заявките за връщане в сайта.
What would you like to do
Какво бихте искали да бъде направено

Перейти к списку запросов на возврат товаров

Статусът на Връщане #[return_id] ще бъде променено

Le statut de ce retour#[return_id] sera changé.
Lo state di return #[return_id] sarà cambiato
Status for retur #[return_id] vil bli endret
